ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 81
ygData.msgSnippet: If this is true about your DE-SK it s a bad thing. If you can t even taunt the mob of a even level magicians pet you are a bad tank. Cause when the clerics
ygData.messageBody:
If this is true about your DE-SK it's a bad thing. If you can't even
taunt the mob of a even level magicians pet you are a bad tank. Cause
when the clerics start healing 600 hps and the wizards burn for 600
points of damage you want to be able to taunt the mob of them (it won't
stay on a lowly pet) so they can continue to heal you and nuke that
critter dead.

Maehem

Xillith ofNeriak wrote:
>
> Couple that with the LOW aggro caused by your slow yet heavy hitting weapon
> and you have a high probability that the creature will turn to the taunt of
> a PET over you or a caster if done right! Group still doesn't want you?
> Then they're dumb because the true talent of the Sk is mob CONTROLL and we
> just get better at it as we age.
